userInfo.wantToSayHi: Want to say hi or report a bug?

noSlots.title: No available time slots found.
noSlots.subtitle: Try to check another study space.

selectSlots: Select the {highlighted} slots you want to book, even across different seats
selectSlotsDescription: For cases of limited library capacity, you can choose slots across different seats to create a sequence and change seats during your study session.

selectedSlots.longSessionAlert: Planning a long study session? Consider including an hour break to allow others to use the space while you step away.
selectedSlots.impossibleToBook: It's impossible to book solely within this tool, trust us, we {link} to make it happen.

onboarding.title: Kurtosis is a tool to find seats at KU Leuven libraries faster.
onboarding.description1: Built by students and is not affiliated with KU Leuven. Please use it responsibly and do not abuse the system.
onboarding.description2: This website communicates directly with the {link} and does not store or process any personal data. Moreover, it's {openSourceLink}.
